info.name: JEP 470 - PEM Encodings of Cryptographic Objects (Preview)
info.dscr: Preview support for reading and writing PEM-encoded cryptographic objects; see PemEncodings.java

info.name: JEP 502 - Stable Values (Preview)
info.dscr: Stable Values offer an immutable data abstraction for performance and safety; see StableValuesDemo.java

info.name: JEP 503 - Remove the 32-bit x86 Port
info.dscr: Removes the legacy 32-bit x86 port from the JDK to reduce maintenance burden; see Remove32BitX86Demo.java

info.name: JEP 505 - Structured Concurrency (Fifth Preview)
info.dscr: Structured concurrency simplifies concurrent programming by treating multiple tasks as a single unit of work; see StructuredConcurrencyDemo.java

info.name: JEP 506 - Scoped Values
info.dscr: Scoped Values provide a safe, immutable alternative to thread-local variables; see ScopedValuesDemo.java

info.name: JEP 507 - Primitive Types in Patterns, instanceof, and switch (Third Preview)
info.dscr: Demonstrates primitive type patterns in instanceof and switch; see PrimitiveTypesDemo.java

info.name: JEP 508 - Vector API (Tenth Incubator)
info.dscr: API for expressing vector computations that reliably compile at runtime to optimal vector instructions on supported CPUs to achieve better performance

info.name: JEP 509 - JFR CPU-Time Profiling
info.dscr: Demonstrates experimental CPU-Time Profiling using JFR; see CpuTimeProfilingDemo.java

info.name: JEP 510 - Key Derivation Function API
info.dscr: Standard API for Key Derivation Functions (KDFs) in Java; see KeyDerivationFunctionDemo.java for usage.

info.name: JEP 511 - Module Import Declarations
info.dscr: Java 25 finalizes module import declarations; see ModuleImportDeclarations.java for details

info.name: JEP 512 - Compact Source Files and Instance Main Methods
info.dscr: Finalizes the 'on-ramp' features for beginners. Allows instance main methods, implicitly declared classes for single-file programs, and introduces a standard IO class, making it easier to write simple Java programs.

info.name: JEP 513 - Flexible Constructor Bodies
info.dscr: It shows the best practises for explicit constructor invocation, see FlexibleConstructorBodiesDemo.java for details

info.name: JEP 514 - Ahead-of-Time Command-Line Ergonomics
info.dscr: Shows simplified and ergonomic CLI commands for Ahead-of-Time compilation; see AheadOfTimeCLI.java

info.name: JEP 515 - Ahead-of-Time Method Profiling
info.dscr: Demonstrates Ahead-of-Time Method Profiling which improves warmup time; see AheadOfTimeMethodProfiling.java

info.name: JEP 518 - JFR Cooperative Sampling
info.dscr: Introduce cooperative sampling in Java Flight Recorder to reduce bias and overhead; see JFRCooperativeSampling.java

info.name: JEP 519 - Compact Object Headers
info.dscr: Adds a demo for JEP 519 â€” Class-File API, showcasing how to parse, inspect, and generate Java class files programmatically; see CompactObjectHeaderDemo.java

info.name: JEP 520 - JFR Method Timing & Tracing
info.dscr: Introduces method timing and tracing capabilities to JFR, allowing for low-overhead method invocation tracing; see Jep520MethodTracingDemo.java

info.name: JEP 521 - Generational Shenandoah
info.dscr: Enhances Shenandoah GC with generational collection, improving performance and pause times by treating short-lived and long-lived objects differently; see GenerationalShenandoahDemo.java
